feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-19T13:58:27.086485Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Bookwyrm – 用于阅读书籍的联合社交网络</stitle>; <id>;https://joinbookwyrm.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.251 455Z</updated>; <link href="https://joinbookwyrm.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;susanthenerd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=susanthenerd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://joinbookwyrm.com/static/images/book-grid.png" style="width: 220px; height: 158px;" />;<br />;BookWyrm 是一个去中心化的社交网络，用于跟踪您的阅读情况、谈论书籍、撰写评论以及发现接下来要读什么。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bookwyrm-the-federated-social-network-for-reading-books" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785285" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NeetoCal，一种日历替代品，是一种商品，并相应定价</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.neeto.com/p/neetocal-a-calendly-alternative-is</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T13:13:06.252864Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.neeto.com/p/ neetocal-a-calendly-alternative-is"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jasim</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jasim</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/ https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F8682f7cc-296d-4eb6-bb92-5a046bb2dc56_1280x720.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;neetoCal 是一款日历替代方案，旨在为会议安排软件市场带来价格调整。它由咨询公司 BigBinary 构建，并且 100% 自举。构建和运行 neetoCal 的成本较低，使他们能够保持较低的价格并在市场上竞争。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#neetocal-a-calendly-alternative-is-a-commodity-and-is-priced-accordingly" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785707" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;高级 Python 掌握 – David Beazley 的课程</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.254907Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/dabeaz-course/python-mastery" />; <author>; <name>;a_bonobo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=a_bonobo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/7201aa1c893c1ca8a9bf286374c1dc7330b4109b396d48382ef47ea77 bd3f7de/dabeaz-course/python-mastery" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;这是一门练习驱动的高级 Python 编程课程，十多年来在企业培训循环中经过了数百次实战测试。由 David Beazley 撰写，Python Cookbook 第三版 (O'Reilly) 和 Python Distilled (Addison-Wesley) 的作者。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#advanced-python-mastery-a-course-by-david-beazley" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785005" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;参议员提议禁止美国立法者、行政部门成员持有股票</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wsj.com/articles/senators-to-propose-ban-on-us-lawmakers-executive-branch-members-owning-stock-6db6411</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.25613 2Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.wsj.com/articles/senators-to-propose-ban-on-us-lawmakers-executive-branch-members-owning-stock-6db6411"/>; <author>; <name>;mfiguiere</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfiguiere</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// images.wsj.net/im-819335?width=700&height=466" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;华盛顿——两名美国参议员本周将提出两党立法，禁止联邦行政部门成员和立法者持有个别公司的股票，因为新的民意调查显示公众对这项措施的广泛支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#senators-to-propose-ban-on-us-lawmakers-executive-branch-members-owning-stock" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785467" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;袋鼠肌腱可以更好、更强地重建人类膝盖</stitle>; <id>;https://lighthouse.mq.edu.au/article/july-2023/kangaroos-could-help-injured-athletes-get-back-in-the-game</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.25 8091Z</updated>; <link href="https://lighthouse.mq.edu.au/article/july-2023/kangaroos-could-help-injured-athletes-get-back-in-the-game"/>; <作者>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lighthouse.mq .edu.au/__data/assets/image/0008/1269422/knee-tile700x400.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚很快就会向世界提供一种独特、坚固、持久且易于使用的受损韧带替代品：袋鼠腱。袋鼠肌腱有可能成为比目前使用身体其他部位肌腱的重建方法更好的选择。它们的强度是人类肌腱的六倍，可以显着减少运动员的康复时间。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#kangaroo-tendons-could-rebuild- human-knees-better-stronger" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784998" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;华硕同意生产和销售英特尔的 NUC 产品</stitle>; <id>;https://www.intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/intel-nuc-systems-agreement.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T01:55:06.259257Z</updated>; <link href="https://www. intel.com/content/www/us/en/newsroom/news/intel-nuc-systems-agreement.html"/>; <author>; <name>;mepian</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mepian</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.intel.com/content/dam/www/public/us/en/newsroom/featured/newsroom-tw tr-logo-rwd.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;英特尔和华硕已就制造、销售和支持下一代计算单元 (NUC) 系统产品线的条款清单达成一致。华硕将成立一个名为华硕 NUC BU 的新业务部门，以延续 NUC 系统产品线。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#asus-agrees-to-manufacture-and-sell-intels-nuc-products" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781248" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;全球对关键矿物的争夺代价高昂且具有破坏性</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-02330-0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.260409Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nature.com/articles/d 41586-023-02330-0"/>; <作者>; <名称>;headalgorithm </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.nature.com/lw767/magazine-assets/d41586-023-02330-0/d4158 6-023-02330-0_25815546.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;在零碳世界中，某些化学元素将像石油和天然气对于化石燃料驱动的世界一样重要。世界正在努力满足对这些元件的需求，这些元件对于电池、风力涡轮机和电动机至关重要。需要国际合作和协调来确保公平获取关键矿产。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-global-fight-for-ritic-minerals-is-costly-and-damaging" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785127" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernew s.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Netscape 和 Sun 宣布 JavaScript (1995)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20070916144913/https://wp.netscape.com/newsref/pr/newsrelease67.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T06:55:06.262408Z</updated>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20070916144913/https://wp.netscape.com/newsref/pr/newsrelease67.html"/>; <author>; <name>;damethos</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=damethos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Netscape 和 Sun 宣布推出 JavaScript，这是一种用于企业网络和网络的开放式跨平台对象脚本语言互联网。 JavaScript 是对 Java 的补充，旨在创建将客户端和服务器上的对象和资源链接在一起的实时在线应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#netscape-and-sun-announce-javascript-1995" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782761" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lazygit: Simple terminal UI for Git commands</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T04:55:06.263898Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazygit"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8456633/174470852-339b5011-5800-4bb9-a628-ff230aa8cd4e.png" style="width: 220px; height: 224px;" />;<br />;Lazygit 是一个简单的 Git 命令终端 UI，旨在使 Git 更易于使用。它为交互式变基、暂存部分文件和切换分支等任务提供了一个用户友好的界面。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lazygit-simple-terminal-ui-for-git-commands" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782018" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FiraCode：带有编程连字的免费等宽字体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T02:55:06.264912Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/tonsky/FiraCode"/>; <author>; <name>;Lwrless</name>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=Lwrless</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tonsky/FiraCode/master/extras/logo.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 126px;" />;<br />;Fira Code 是一种免费的等宽字体，包含用于常见编程多字符组合的连字。它有助于更​​快地阅读和理解代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#firacode-free-monospaced-font-with-programming-ligatures" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;本地异步执行器以及为什么它们应该是默认值（Rust）</stitle>; <id>;https://maciej.codes/2022-06-09-local-async.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T06:55:06.269126Z</updated>; <link href="https://maciej.codes/2022-0 6-09-local-async.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rklaehn</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rklaehn</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://maciej.codes/maciej.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;编写聊天服务器是学习 Rust 异步编程的常见方法。然而，Rust 异步编程中默认的多线程方法可能会导致不必要的线程同步和复杂性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#local-async-executors-and-why-they-should-be-the-default-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782884" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;多代理模拟中的 SHOW-1 和 Showrunner 代理</stitle>; <id>;https://fablestudio.github.io/showrunner-agents/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T05:55:06.270922Z</updated>; <link href="https://fablestudio.github.io/showrunner-agent s/"/>; <author>; <name>;boffbowsh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=boffbowsh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://fablestudio.github.io/showrunner-agents/static/images/ui%20comparison%20copy.png" style="width: 220px; height: 94px;" />;<br />;老虎机效应​​是指这样一种场景：人工智能制作的内容的生成感觉更像是一场随机的机会游戏，而不是一个深思熟虑的创作过程。当前现成的生成式人工智能系统不支持或鼓励在长期创意目标的背景下进行多个创意评估步骤。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-1-and-showrunner-agents-in-multi-agent-simulations" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782314" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Proton Pass：开源和加密的密码管理器应用</stitle>; <id>;https://proton.me/pass</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T10:55:06.272566Z</updated>; <link href="https://proton.me/pass"/>; <author>; <name>;fvgs</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=fvgs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://proton.me/static/5a4e009fa41a441ccd1eb39d8983f615/proton-pass-icon-alone.svg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Proton Pass 是一款开源加密密码管理器应用程序，可帮助您生成安全密码并存储登录凭据、笔记、信用卡信息等。它还提供自动填充、双因素身份验证、电子邮件别名生成和加密笔记等功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#proton-pass-open-source-and-encrypted-password-manager-app" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784326" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;微软因 Teams、Office 365 面临欧盟反垄断审查</stitle>; <id>;https://www.windowscentral.com/microsoft/microsoft-faces-antitrust-scrutiny-from-the-european-union</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T07:55:06.273973Z</updated>; <link href="https://www .windowscentral.com/microsoft/microsoft-faces-antitrust-scrutiny-from-the-european-union"/>; <作者>; <name>;pjmlp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pjmlp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/S2cALdpLUbeKG8v3dV XMJH-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Microsoft 将视频会议应用 Teams 与其基于生产力的 Office 365 和 Microsoft 365 订阅捆绑在一起。预计欧盟委员会将调查这一配对是否违反反垄断法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-faces-antitrust-scrutiny-from-the-eu-over-teams-office-365" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782918" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Highlight.io (YC W23) – 开源、全栈 Web 应用程序监控</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36774611</id>; <updated>;2023-07-18T16:55:06.275774Z</updated>; <link href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36774611"/>; <author>; <name>;podoman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=podoman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Highlight.io 是一个用于现代 Web 应用程序的开源可观察性平台。它提供无缝连接的会话重放、错误监控和日志记录产品。该平台基于 OpenTelemetry、rrweb 和 ClickHouse 等开源项目构建。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-highlight-io-yc-w23-open-source-full-stack-web-app-monitoring" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36774611" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么奥本海默值得拥有自己的电影[视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xzv84ZdtlE0</id>; <updated>;2023-07-19T12:55:06.277158Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/ watch?v=Xzv84ZdtlE0"/>; <author>; <name>;arihantparsoya</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=arihantparsoya</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/Xzv84ZdtlE0"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#why-oppenheimer-deserves-his-own-movie-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36785178" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;回力阿莱怎么了？ （2013）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sbnation.com/longform/2013/2/28/4036934/jai-alai-sport-in-america-miami</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T02:55:06.279455Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sbnation.com/longform/2013/2 /28/4036934/jai-alai-sport-in-america-miami"/>; <author>; <name>;ecliptik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ecliptik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://assets.sbnation.com.s3.amazonaws.com/features/Jai-Alai/jai-alai- 1.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：315px；" />;<br />;迈阿密回力广场 (Jai Alai fronton) 曾经是一个熙熙攘攘、充满活力的场所，现在几乎空无一人。座位是空的，餐厅和包厢都没有使用，观众只有投注者。回力球曾经是一项受欢迎的观赏性运动，现在已成为一项垂死的运动。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-happened-to-jai-alai-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;来自 KPH 的 Enigma 加密传输，以 426 KHz 和短波</stitle>; <id>;https://www.radiomarine.org/mrhs-events</id>; <updated>;2023-07-18T23:55:06.281261Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.radiomarine.org/mrhs-events"/>; <author>; <name>;740 2</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=7402</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/605b9bfbc9a8d0510181f4e3/d46da299-e0be-4db5-8a98-3b2601bfdb5d/En igma-01.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：99px；" />;<br />;MRHS 和密码历史博物馆将使用 Enigma 编码机发送一条编码消息。邀请听众尝试解码消息，成功解码将获得证书。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#enigma-crypto-transmission-from-kph-at-426-khz-and-shortwave" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36780297" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;疯狂帕斯卡</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tebe6502/Mad-Pascal</id>; <更新>;2023-07-19T02:55:06.282283Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/tebe6502/Mad-Pascal"/>; <作者>; <name>;chai manmeow</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chaimanmeow</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zbyti/a8-mad-pascal-bench-suite/master/suite.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 158px;" />;<br />;Mad-Pascal (MP) 是 Atari XE/XL 的 32 位 Turbo Pascal 编译器。它与 Free Pascal 编译器 (FPC) 兼容，并允许在多个平台上执行可执行代码。 MP不是FPC的移植，而是基于SUB-Pascal和XD-Pascal编写的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mad-pascal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36781525" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;懒惰docker：一种更懒惰的方式来管理一切 Docker</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazydocker</id>; <updated>;2023-07-18T20:55:06.285333Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/jesseduffield/lazydocker"/>; <author>; <name>;mottiden</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=mottiden</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8456633/59972109-8e9c8480-95cc-11e9-8350-38f7f86ba76d.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：126px；" />;<br />;Lazydocker 是一个简单的终端 UI，用于管理 Docker 和 Docker-compose。它的目的是在一个终端窗口中提供所有必要的信息和常用命令。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lazydocker-a-lazier-way-to-manage-everything-docker" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36778905" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;骆驼 2</stitle>; <id>;https://ai.meta.com/llama/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-18T16:55:06.287261Z</updated>; <link href="https://ai.meta.com/llama/"/>; <author>; <name>;friggeri</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=friggeri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;
